tutorial.speak:
To set up tasks for your leaders, church members, or groups, navigate to the Chums Dashboard.
Then click the plus sign on the task bar on the right side of your screen.
Here is where you will fill out the information for your task. Since you are the one that is making the task, it is associated with you.
Click the assign to box and type in the name of a person or click on group and type the name of a group.
Hit search.
Select the person or add them if they are not in the database.
Now give the task a title.
Type in a note to the person the task is assigned to.
Click save.
You can now see the task that you assigned. If you need to edit the task, just click on it and edit.
Now I’ll log in as Terry Seven so you can see what the task notification looks like to the person receiving the task.
I’m now logged in as Terry Seven.
You can see the tasks assigned to me listed on the right side of your screen. You can also see these tasks on your mobile app.
Click on the task to see the details.
Once the task is completed, you can change the status from open to closed.
Choose closed.
The task is now completed and closed.
It no longer shows up on your Chums dashboard.
